short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily view historical pricing data from costbot.net. Get free price alerts when the price drops and save money!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your online shopping experience with the enhanced Costbot Price Tracker, the indispensable Chrome extension for savvy shoppers. Stay ahead with precise price history tracking, instant price drop alerts, personalized savings, and now, new features - 'My Profile' and 'Related Products' to make your shopping journey even more rewarding.

✨ Key Features:

Find. 🧐 Discover the best deals by tracking price history across supported websites. With the new 'Related Products' feature, explore similar items and make more informed decisions.
Follow. 🔔 Set your target price and get notified when the product price drops. Manage your followed products effortlessly with the 'My Profile' feature.
Save. 💰 Shop with confidence knowing you're getting the best deal possible.

🔍 Optimize your search results for shopping and price tracker extensions with Costbot Price Tracker. Our sophisticated platform ensures you never miss out on the best deals from your favorite retailers. Set it up once and let Costbot do the work for you!

📈 Detailed Price History: Gain insights into the price trends of the products you're interested in. Make informed decisions with our easy-to-read price charts and comprehensive price history.

🔔 Real-time Price Drop Alerts: Set your target price and let Costbot notify you when the item reaches your desired price. No more manual price checks or missed opportunities.

👥 My Profile: Sign in with your email and manage all your followed products and user settings in one place. A personalized shopping experience is just a click away.

🔎 Related Products: Discover similar items directly on the product page, making it easier than ever to compare across stores and choose the best deal.

📱 Seamless Integration: Costbot Price Tracker works flawlessly with our Costbot website, providing a seamless shopping experience across platforms.

💼 Supported Retailers: Track prices from popular online stores like Amazon, Walmart, Target, Home Depot, and more. We're always expanding our list of supported websites to help you save even more!

🔐 Privacy Focused: We value your privacy and never share or sell your personal data. Shop with confidence knowing your information is safe with us.

Level up your online shopping game with Costbot Price Tracker - the ultimate Chrome extension for finding, following, and saving on your favorite products. Download now and start saving today!

For support, email support@costbot.net
